solutions:
# YOUR CODE HERE

# Read the number of buildings
N = int(input())

# Read the heights of the buildings
heights = list(map(int, input().split()))

# Get the height of the first building
first_height = heights[0]

# Initialize the position of the tallest building to -1
tallest_position = -1

# Iterate through the buildings
for i in range(1, N):
    # Check if the current building is taller than the first one
    if heights[i] > first_height:
        # Update the position of the tallest building
        tallest_position = i + 1
        # Exit the loop since we found the leftmost tallest building
        break

# Print the position of the tallest building
print(tallest_position)
